poliastro2.math.propagation.base¶

Functions

func_twobody(t0, u_, k)

Differential equation for the initial value two body problem.
poliastro2.math.propagation.base.func_twobody(t0, u_, k)¶

Differential equation for the initial value two body problem.

Parameters:

  • t0 (float) – Time.

  • u (numpy.ndarray) – Six component state vector [x, y, z, vx, vy, vz] (km, km/s).

  • k (float) – Standard gravitational parameter.
